statements.select: select tb_QcXm_ID, tb_QcXm_xmmc, tb_QcXm_wldm, tb_QcXm_lx, tb_QcXm_vamin, tb_QcXm_vamax, tb_QcXm_vadef, tb_QcXm_dxz, tb_QcXm_qclx, tb_QcXm_wpbs from tb_QcXm where tb_QcXm_ID = $value$
select tb_QcXm_ID, tb_QcXm_xmmc, tb_QcXm_wldm, tb_QcXm_lx, tb_QcXm_vamin, tb_QcXm_vamax, tb_QcXm_vadef, tb_QcXm_dxz, tb_QcXm_qclx, tb_QcXm_wpbs from tb_QcXm
select tb_QcXm_ID, tb_QcXm_xmmc, tb_QcXm_wldm, tb_QcXm_lx, tb_QcXm_vamin, tb_QcXm_vamax, tb_QcXm_vadef, tb_QcXm_dxz, tb_QcXm_qclx, tb_QcXm_wpbs from tb_QcXm
statements.insert:
insert into tb_QcXm ( tb_QcXm_xmmc, tb_QcXm_wldm, tb_QcXm_lx, tb_QcXm_vamin, tb_QcXm_vamax, tb_QcXm_vadef, tb_QcXm_dxz, tb_QcXm_qclx, tb_QcXm_wpbs ) values ( #tb_QcXm_xmmc#, #tb_QcXm_wldm#, #tb_QcXm_lx#, #tb_QcXm_vamin#, #tb_QcXm_vamax#, #tb_QcXm_vadef#, #tb_QcXm_dxz#, #tb_QcXm_qclx#, #tb_QcXm_wpbs# )
select @@IDENTITY as value
statements.update:
update tb_QcXm
tb_QcXm_xmmc = #tb_QcXm_xmmc#
tb_QcXm_wldm = #tb_QcXm_wldm#
tb_QcXm_lx = #tb_QcXm_lx#
tb_QcXm_vamin = #tb_QcXm_vamin#
tb_QcXm_vamax = #tb_QcXm_vamax#
tb_QcXm_vadef = #tb_QcXm_vadef#
tb_QcXm_dxz = #tb_QcXm_dxz#
tb_QcXm_qclx = #tb_QcXm_qclx#
tb_QcXm_wpbs = #tb_QcXm_wpbs#
where tb_QcXm_ID = $tb_QcXm_ID$
